text: Half Angel is a 1936 American comedy movie directed by Sidney Lanfield and starring Frances Dee, Brian Donlevy, Charles Butterworth, Helen Westley, Henry Stephenson, Sara Haden, Julius Tannen. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1936 comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Sidney Lanfield
title: Half Angel (1936 movie)
